statements: SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_sentiment_tracking ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) as average_score FROM customer_sentiment_tracking GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT interaction_date, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment_tracking ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_sentiment_tracking GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM customer_sentiment_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE interaction_date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customers WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customers ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_text FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, social_media_interactions.interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN social_media_interactions ON customers.id = social_media_interactions.customer_id WHERE customers.id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers INNER JOIN social_media_interactions ON customers.id = social_media_interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING highest_sentiment > 70 ORDER BY highest_sentiment DESC;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score, interaction_timestamp FROM CustomerSentiments;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, survey_timestamp FROM SatisfactionLevels;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_content FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerSentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerSentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) as avg_satisfaction_score, customer_id FROM SatisfactionLevels GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_content FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_content LIKE '%special offer%';
SELECT * FROM SatisfactionLevels WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, social_media_handle FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiments_analysis ORDER BY customer_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiments_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions_history WHERE interaction_type = 'email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiments_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions_history WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions_history WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY interaction_date;

SELECT social_media_posts.customer_id, social_media_posts.post_content, sentiments_analysis.sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts LEFT JOIN sentiments_analysis ON social_media_posts.customer_id = sentiments_analysis.customer_id;
